name: Tome of Elements
description:
Join Ryleus as he searches for the powerful Tome of elements, travel through the elemental rooms while completing puzzles and defeating enemies as you get closer to the mythical tome.  

Ryleus is a weak wizard who has been cast out by the wizards college in his hometown.  Help him regain his reputation back as a powerful wizard by learning from the Tome of Elements.  Travel with him as he masters arcane, earth, water, fire, and air.
